test.name: Cenário 01: Login de acesso Rivesa com Email

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Projetos\SuiteTeste(TocaObra)\result\geckodriver-1.log

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Dado que estou na página home do login
Acessar a página de login do site (Rivesa)
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então direciona o cliente para a página de login
Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Image
kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Quando informo os dados do login com Email
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'campomourao@rivesa.com.br' into text field 'id: username'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'mudar123!' into text field 'id: password'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então sistema direciona para página home
Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Image
kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Então acessa a página meu perfil
Acessar a página de meu perfil (Rivesa)
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
